errors.error_description: The 'Python version' section incorrectly states that the package is compatible with Python 2.7, which is not supported.
correction_candidates: Before the installation, please make sure that you are using the latest Python version.
Before the installation, please make sure that you are using a Python 3 version.
Before the installation, please make sure that you are using one of the supported Python versions (see [pyproject.toml](https://github.com/JaGeo/LobsterPy/blob/main/pyproject.toml)).
Before the installation, please make sure that you are using one of the supported Python versions (see the badges at the top).
errors.golden_answer: Before the installation, please make sure that you are using one of the supported Python versions (see [pyproject.toml](https://github.com/JaGeo/LobsterPy/blob/main/pyproject.toml)).

errors.error_description: The description for `lobsterpy create-inputs` incorrectly states that it uses a non-existent `lobster.yaml` file for configuration.
correction_candidates: ``lobsterpy create-inputs`` will create standard inputs based on an existing `lobsterin` file.
``lobsterpy create-inputs`` will create standard inputs based on existing POSCAR, POTCAR, and INCAR files.
``lobsterpy create-inputs`` will create standard inputs based on an existing `POSCAR.lobster` file.
``lobsterpy create-inputs`` will create standard inputs based on an existing `vasprun.xml` file.
errors.golden_answer: ``lobsterpy create-inputs`` will create standard inputs based on existing POSCAR, POTCAR, and INCAR files.
